channel.title: Getting Started on Dud
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Dud

item.title: A Tour of Dud
item.description: A Tour of Dud # Create a project. $ mkdir ~/cifar && cd ~/cifar $ dud init Add some data and tell Dud to track it. $ curl -sSO https://www.cs.toronto.edu/~kriz/cifar-10-python.tar.gz $ dud stage gen -o cifar-10-python.tar.gz | tee cifar.yaml $ dud stage add cifar.yaml $ dud status Commit the data to the Dud cache. $ dud commit $ cat cifar.yaml $ dud status $ tree -an Add a stage to extract the data.
